tuv.seg: Comptroller and Auditor General
An tArd-Reachtaire Ciste agus Cuntas
The Comptroller and Auditor General carries out an audit each year of the State's accounts
Déanann an tArd-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste iniúchadh go bliantúil ar chuntais Stáit
An outline of the responsibilities of public bodies and other designated bodies under the Freedom of Information Act and your right to access personal information held by the bodies
Cur síos ar na dualgais atá ar údaráis phoiblí faoin Acht um Shaoráil Faisnéise agus do chearta teacht ar eolas pearsanta fút féin atá ag údaráis phoiblí
Access to environmental information
Rochtain ar fhaisnéis comhshaoil
You have the right to access certain information about the environment and pollutants that may affect it
Tá ceart rochtana agat ar fhaisnéis áirithe faoin gcomhshaol agus truailleáin a bhféadfadh tionchar a bheith acu ar an gcomhshaol
Find out how to access environmental information
Faigh amach conas rochtain a fháil ar fhaisnéis comhshaoil
This document is in: Environment > Environmental law
This document is in: Comhshaol > Dlí Chomhshaoil
The role of the Data Protection Commissioner in protecting the privacy rights of individuals under the Data Protection Acts
Ról an Choimisinéara Cosanta Sonraí cearta príobháideachais dhaoine in Éirinn a chosaint faoi na hAchtanna um Chosaint Sonraí
The main duty of the Irish Ombudsman is to investigate complaints made by members of the public about how they have been treated by public bodies in Ireland
Is é príomh dhualgas an Ombudsman fiosrú a dhéanamh ar aon ghearán a dhéanann duine faoin tslí ar chaith eagraíocht phoiblí leis/léi
Members of the public can raise issues of general public interest or public policy with the Houses of the Oireachtas
Féadfaidh muintir an phobail saincheisteanna atá ina ndíol spéise don phobal i gcoitinne nó saincheisteanna beartais phoiblí a thabhairt chun solais le Tithe an Oireachtais
The Register of Lobbying is maintained by the Standards in Public Office Commission
Is é an Coimisiún um Chaighdeáin in Oifigí Poiblí a chothabhálann an Clár Brústocaireachta
Find out who is required to register
Faigh amach na dreamanna nach foláir dóibh clárú
Rights Tribunals are tribunals that make binding decisions about the rights of people in Ireland
Pléann an cháipéis seo binsí a dhéanann socruithe daingne i dtaobh cearta pobal in Éirinn
The High Court has the power to cancel any law or part of any law that is unconstitutional
Tá sé de chumhacht ag an Ard-Chúirt aon dlí nó cuid de dhlí nach bhfuil ag luí leis an mBunreacht a chur ar ceal
Discusses what constitutes unconstitutional legislation and how legislation is judged to be unconstitutional
Plé maidir le reachtaíocht mhíbhunreachtúil agus conas a thugadh breithiúnas ar reachtaíocht mhíbhunreachtúil
Judicial review of public decisions
Athbhreithniú Breithiúnach ar Chinntí Poiblí
Public decisions may be judicially reviewed by the High Court to determine whether they are illegal
Is féidir leis an Ard-Chúirt athbhreithniú breithiúnach a dhéanamh ar chinntí poiblí le dearbhú an bhfuil siad neamhdhleathach
Find out how to initiate judicial review proceedings
Faigh amach conas imeachtaí athbhreithnithe bhreithiúnaigh a thionscnamh
Judicial review in planning and environmental matters
Athbhreithniú breithiúnach i gcúrsaí pleanála agus comhshaoil
Public decisions may be judicially reviewed by the High Court to determine whether they are illegal
Is féidir leis an Ard-Chúirt athbhreithniú breithiúnach a dhéanamh ar chinntí poiblí le dearbhú an bhfuil siad neamhdhleathach
Find out about judicial review in the environmental and planning areas
Faigh amach faoi athbhreithniú breithiúnach sna réimsí comhshaoil agus pleanála
This document is in: Environment > Environmental law
This document is in: Comhshaol > Dlí Chomhshaoil

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
Fundamental Rights under the Irish Constitution
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
